value.string:
"""
 Create new Content by cloning an existing document
 or by creating a new document.
 
 This script is called by the admin toolbox.
 
 Cloning or creation is prevented if document already exists
 with same reference, version, language. Pretty messages
 are provided to the user.
 """
 
 translateString = context.Base_translateString
 form_data = context.REQUEST.form
 
 # Define a list of field name to take into account in the cloning process
 ACCEPTABLE_FORM_ID_LIST = [ \
 'clone_reference'
 , 'clone_language'
 , 'clone_version'
 , 'clone_revision'
 , 'clone_title'
 , 'clone_short_title'
 ]
 
 # First make sure that no document already exists with the
 # same portal_type, reference, language and version.
 if clone:
 portal_type = context.getPortalType()
 else:
 portal_type = form_data['clone_portal_type']
 
 # prepare query params
 kw = {'portal_type' : portal_type}
 if form_data.get('clone_reference'): 
 kw['reference'] = form_data['clone_reference']
 if form_data.get('clone_version'): 
 kw['version'] = form_data['clone_version']
 if form_data.get('clone_language'): 
 kw['language'] = form_data['clone_language']
 
 # Count documents of same reference and prepare kw
 count = int(context.portal_catalog.countResults(**kw)[0][0])
 kw['reference'] = kw.get('reference', 'undefined')
 kw['language'] = kw.get('language', 'any')
 kw['version'] = kw.get('version', 'undefined')
 
 # if count results not 0, warn user
 if count:
 msg = translateString("Sorry, a ${portal_type} with reference '${reference}' and version '${version} [${language}]' already exists. Please select another reference or version.", mapping = kw)
 return context.Base_redirect(form_id, 
 editable_mode=editable_mode,
 keep_items={'portal_status_message': msg})
 
 # Standard cloning method
 if clone:
 # We copy contents in place if possible
 directory = getattr(context, 'original_container', None) or context.getParentValue()
 # Copy and paste the object
 original_id = getattr(context, 'original_id', None) or context.getId()
 # This is required for objects acquired in Web Section
 clipboard = directory.manage_copyObjects(ids=[original_id])
 paste_result = directory.manage_pasteObjects(cb_copy_data=clipboard)
 new_object = directory[paste_result[0]['new_id']]
 message_kind = 'clone'
 else:
 # Guess the new document module
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 module = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type=portal_type)
 new_object = module.newContent(portal_type = portal_type)
 form_id = 'view'
 message_kind = 'new'
 
 # Set properties to the new object
 edit_kw = {}
 property_id_list = new_object.propertyIds()
 for (key, val) in form_data.items():
 if key in ACCEPTABLE_FORM_ID_LIST and key[len('clone_'):] in property_id_list:
 edit_kw[key[len('clone_'):]] = val
 new_object.edit(**edit_kw)
 
 if not editable_mode: 
 form_id = 'view'
 msg = translateString("Created %s ${portal_type} with reference '${reference}' and version '${version} [${language}]'." % message_kind, mapping = kw)
 return new_object.Base_redirect(form_id, 
 editable_mode=1,
 keep_items={'portal_status_message': msg})
